name: MXSignpostMetric
desc: An object representing a custom metric.

items.name: func mxSignpost(OSSignpostType, dso: UnsafeRawPointer, log: OSLog, name: StaticString, signpostID: OSSignpostID, StaticString, [CVarArg])
items.desc: Posts a single custom metric, the start time of a custom metric, or the end time of a custom metric to the log system.

items.name: func mxSignpostAnimationIntervalBegin(dso: UnsafeRawPointer, log: OSLog, name: StaticString, signpostID: OSSignpostID, StaticString, [CVarArg])
items.desc: Posts the start time of an animation interval to the log system.

items.name: var signpostIntervalData: MXSignpostIntervalData?
items.desc: The data captured for a custom metric.

items.name: class MXSignpostIntervalData
items.desc: A data object representing the captured data for a custom metric.

items.name: var signpostName: String
items.desc: The developer-specified name of the custom metric represented by the object.

items.name: var signpostCategory: String
items.desc: The developer-specified category of the custom metric represented by the object.

items.name: var totalCount: Int
items.desc: The total number of occurrences of the captured custom metric.
